amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an additional $10.5 million in funding for the Counter-electronics High Power Microwave Missile Project and to reduce funding for the Rapid Innovation Fund by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce appropriations for Defense-wide rapid innovation and increases the appropriations to develop a high power microwave cruise missile weapon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 93 - 327 (Roll no. 383).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 93 - 327 (Roll no. 383).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Nugent.
